member.name: CERT_LDAP_STORE_OPENED_PARA
member.summary: The CERT_LDAP_STORE_OPENED_PARA structure is used with the function when the CERT_STORE_PROV_LDAP provider is specified by using the CERT_LDAP_STORE_OPENED_FLAG flag to specify both the existing LDAP session to use to perform the query as well as the LDAP query string.

member.name: CERT_LDAP_STORE_OPENED_PARA.pvLdapSessionHandle
member.summary: The handle of the existing LDAP session. This is the handle that is returned by the ldap_init function.

member.name: CERT_LDAP_STORE_OPENED_PARA.pwszLdapUrl
member.summary: The address of a null-terminated Unicode string that contains the LDAP query string. For more information about LDAP query strings, see LDAP Dialect.
